posts.message:
[align=center][img]https://images2.imgbox.com/45/80/uuQENmdH_o.png[/img][/align]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=5002443][img]https://i.imgur.com/EEflOvL.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#ffffff][b]HACKUMAN SUSPENDED[/b][/color]
After the end of season 2, Hackuman was suspended in order to make some changes for the upcoming season. The estimated re-launch is currently aimed for October 1st. During this time, eggs will not be awarded for posts. All existing eggs expired and everyone will be starting fresh at the start of season 3. You can learn more by reading [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6248322][i]this thread.[/i][/url]

[color=#ffffff][b]MORE VENDOR BENEFITS[/b][/color]
  [mention=1]   recently add a new perk to being a Vendor. They are now allowed to wear signatures of up to 1mb, while everyone else has to settle with 500kb or less. This change will allow marketers to have higher-quality advertisements. If you would like to apply for V3ndor, and to see a full list of current Vendor benefits and  more about these changes, click [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6248863][i]here.[/i][/url]

[color=#ffffff][b]SECRET SOCIETY[/b][/color]
The Gold Standard has been sold by [mention=1391436] to [mention=4873170] and was rebranded to the [i]Secret Society[/i]. It is a global profit oriented blackhat network. Members share resources and knowledge in order to push each other to extraordinary levels. Loyalty and an extreme work ethic are characteristics of every member. Recruitment status is currently unknown and there is no official thread for the group.

[color=#ffffff][b]EASIER IMAGE UPLOADS[/b][/color]
In an attempt to improve user experiences with image uploads, a new quick add button was added to posts and threads allowing users to selected images from their devices or through an image url. This is a new change that could use your feedback, feel free to make your opinion known [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6250571][i]here.[/i][/url]

[color=#ffffff][b]GROUP & CREW NEWS[/b][/color]

 [mention=7] is allowing members the chance to earn entry into the official group [color=#7f1111][b][url=https://hackforums.net/memberlist.php?action=do_search&group_choice=48]FALLEN[/url][/b][/color]. You can learn more about this challenge by visiting the official thread: https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6248510

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=561239][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v5/honors-hydra.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=white][b]User News[/b][/color]
[list]
[*]. [mention=4227846] reached 16,000 posts - about time scrub.
[*]. [mention=5239601] is the first member to report a confirmed bug bounty, part of the [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6244277]HF Bug Bounty Program[/url] - job well done!
[/list]

[color=white][b]Awards[/b][/color]
[list]
[*]. [mention=4227846] earned the Molten Sword of Hackúman [award=184] award - congratulations!
[/list]

[color=#ffffff][b]Bans & Closures[/b][/color]
[list]
[*]. The ban was lifted on [mention=5184709] .
[*]. James was closed.
[*]. [mention=2682887] was banned.
[*]. [mention=4993290] was banned.
[*]. [mention=646178] was banned.
[*]. [mention=811] and [mention=5051324] took vacation bans.
[*]. Several ban-evaders and spammy nerds were banned/closed.

[*]. [mention=5184709] was closed by request.
[/list]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=5002443][img]https://i.imgur.com/904SqMN.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#ffffff][b]HUM SEASON 2 WINNER[/b][/color]
Congratulations!  [mention=4227846]  is the winner of Hackúman season 2 and was awarded the [award=184] Molten Sword of Hackúman. He is the third recipient of this award. Take a moment to congratulate him or to tell him to go touch some grass for his efforts.

[color=#ffffff][b]HIGH-QUALITY GUIDE[/b][/color]
  [mention=3995095]  took a lot of time and effort to create an informative thread on whitehat hacking and cybersecurity. If interested, feel free to take the time to give it a read and educate yourself. [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6247225&pid=62035051#pid62035051][b][GUIDE] - WHITE HAT HACKING / CYBERSECURITY[/b][/url]

[color=#ffffff][b]FEATURED FORUM PRICE ADJUSTMENT[/b][/color]
The cost to have a Featured Forum Link advertising your product has been discounted down to $8 per day. This makes advertising your threads easily affordable and will help increase the amount of views and sales your business receives. You can learn more about these changes [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6249957]here[/url].

[color=#ffffff][b]FIRST BUG BOUNTY REWARD RECIPIENT[/b][/color]
The user   [mention=5239601]   was rewarded for finding an rXSS in the API token issuance. If you'd like to earn rewards, check out all of the information about the Bug Bounty Program here: https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6244277&pid=62001217#pid62001217

[align=center][b][color=#ffffff]SUPPORT THE HF NEWS[/color][/b]

If you would like to support Scribe and Writ3rs, feel free to wear our support signature. If you decide to wear the [url=https://hackforums.net/usercp.php?action=editsig]signature[/url] you will be entered into a drawing where we will select one supporter and award them [color=#20d342][b]$50[/b][/color] whenever the next edition is released. This offer is exclusively for upgraded members only.[/align]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6250425][img]https://images2.imgbox.com/13/21/PQcf0GcN_o.png[/img][/url][/align]

[align=center]The winner of August contest is: [color=#E8C500][size=large] [mention=3653201] [/size][/color][/align]

[size=small][align=center][color=#ffffff][i][b]This edition of Hack Forums News was a collaboration of [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6240819]Scribe[/url] and the [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6204235]Warriors[/url].[/b][/i][/color][/align][/size]
